metadata.description:
With this NFT purchase you will unlock access to ‚ÄúED3N_001‚Äù 3D digital sculpture animation, music performed by Nicola Formichetti and digital still artwork. This NFT is a .MP4 displaying the actual 3D digital sculpture of Nicola.

The unlockable content includes:

*Creative Zoom Discussion Call with Artists Nicola Formichetti and Gigi Gvalia

*Guaranteed Allowlist for future Formichetti NFT projects to be announced in the near future

*Special custom signed thank you note from Nicola and doodle for you!

*Special merchandise thank you from Folio platform

The experience changes over time:

*1 Week Hold Animation Adds Music by Nick Weiss

*2 Week Hold New NFT Adds Nicola‚Äôs Digital Signature

More details on the art piece from the artist:

Web3 here I come. üëæ  As you probably already know, I‚Äôve always had a love for futurism, cyberspace, and anything new, so naturally I want to find out everything I can about creating and collaborating in a web3 world. We‚Äôre experiencing a renaissance for digital art that will reshape the way creatives work, so I want to learn this new digital language and apply it to what I do and inspire other creators to take the leap.

First step: creating my avatar. This was my first time using the 3D Scanning machine on myself! I‚Äôm very excited to be working with Folio, a curated NFT community for diverse LGBTQ+ artists, to explore this new era of digital creativity. Huge thank you to Human Engine 3D for letting me experiment in your studio!

Sculpture & Music Production: Nicola Formichetti

3D Renderings: Gigi Gvalia

Studio: Human Engine 3D, Los Angeles, California

NFT Production: Folio

https://folionft.com/
